00054 void DataSetTest::setUp()
00055 {
00056         data = new GenericData;
00057         GenericFileReader reader;
00058         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE;
00059         reader.SetFilename(name);
00060         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00061         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00062         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin != dchEnd);
00064         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00065         dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin, dphEnd);
00066         void* handle = MapFile(name);
00067         dataPlane = new DataSet(data->Header().GetFilename(), *dphBegin, handle);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void DataSetTest::tearDown()
00071 {
00072         UnmapFile();
00073         if (dataPlane)
00074                 dataPlane->Delete();
00075         delete data;
00076 }

00078 void DataSetTest::testCreation()
00079 {
00080         DataSetHeader header;
00081         DataSet* dc = new DataSet(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, header,0);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00083         dc->Delete();
00084 }

00129 void DataSetTest::testproperty_Header()
00130 {
00131         // Get the DataSetHeader
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00133         const DataSetHeader& header = dataPlane->Header();
00134 
00135         // Get the DataSetHeader from the FileHeader to check against
00136         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00137         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin != dchEnd);
00139         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00140         dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin, dphEnd);
00141 
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetName() == dphBegin->GetName());
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetDataSize() == dphBegin->GetDataSize());
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetRowSize() == dphBegin->GetRowSize());
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetNameValParamCnt() == dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt());
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetColumnInfo(0) == dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0));
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetColumnCnt() == dphBegin->GetColumnCnt());
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetRowCnt() == dphBegin->GetRowCnt());
00149 }

00151 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single()
00152 {
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00154 
00155         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00156         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00157         {
00158                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00159                 u_int16_t value;
00160                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00161                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00162         }
00163 
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00165 }

00168 {
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00170 
00171         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00172         Uint16Vector values;
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, 0, rows, values));
00174 
00175         // Check the values
00176         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00177         {
00178                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00179                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00180         }
00181 
00182         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00183 }

00185 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_TooManyRows()
00186 {
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);

00190         Uint16Vector values;

00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values.size() == rows);

00204 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_InChunks()
00205 {
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00207 
00208         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00209         int32_t chunks = 7;
00210         int32_t rowsPerChunk = rows/chunks;
00211 
00212         for (int32_t chunk = 0; chunk < chunks; ++chunk)
00213         {
00214                 int32_t startRow = chunk*rowsPerChunk;
00215                 Uint16Vector values;
00216                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, startRow, rowsPerChunk, values));
00217 
00218                 int32_t rowsInVector = rowsPerChunk;
00219                 if (dataPlane->Rows() < startRow+rowsPerChunk)
00220                         rowsInVector = dataPlane->Rows() - startRow;
00221 
00222                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values.size() == rowsInVector);
00223 
00224                 // Check the values
00225                 for( int32_t row = startRow; row < rowsInVector+startRow; ++row )
00226                 {
00227                         u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00228                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row-startRow] == expected);
00229                 }
00230         }
00231 
00232         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00233 }
00234 
00235 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw()
00236 {
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00238 
00239         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00240         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows];
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, rows, values));
00242 
00243         // Check the values
00244         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00245         {
00246                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00247                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00248         }
00249 
00250         delete [] values;
00251 
00252         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00253 }

00255 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_TooManyRows()
00256 {
00257         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00258 
00259         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00260         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows*2];
00261         u_int32_t rowsRead = 0;
00262         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(rowsRead = dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, rows*2, values));
00263         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rowsRead == rows);
00264 
00265         // Check the values
00266         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00267         {
00268                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00269                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00270         }
00271 
00272         delete [] values;
00273 
00274         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00275 }

00277 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_InChunks()
00278 {
00279         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00280 
00281         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00282         int32_t chunks = 7;
00283         int32_t rowsPerChunk = rows/chunks;
00284 
00285         for (int32_t chunk = 0; chunk < chunks; ++chunk)
00286         {
00287                 int32_t startRow = chunk*rowsPerChunk;
00288                 u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows*2];
00289                 u_int32_t rowsRead = 0;
00290                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(rowsRead = dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, startRow, rowsPerChunk, values));
00291 
00292                 int32_t rowsInArray = rowsPerChunk;
00293                 if (dataPlane->Rows() < startRow+rowsPerChunk)
00294                         rowsInArray = dataPlane->Rows() - startRow;
00295 
00296                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rowsRead == rowsInArray);
00297 
00298                 // Check the values
00299                 for( int32_t row = startRow; row < rowsInArray+startRow; ++row )
00300                 {
00301                         u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00302                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row-startRow] == expected);
00303                 }
00304 
00305                 delete [] values;
00306         }
00307 
00308         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00309 }

00355 
00356 void* DataSetTest::MapFile(const std::string& fileName)
00357 {
00358 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00359         if (fileHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00360         {
00361                 // Create the file.
00362                 fileHandle = CreateFile(fileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00363                                 NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
00364                 if (fileHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00365                 {
00366                         return 0;
00367                 }
00368         }
00369         if (fileMapHandle == NULL)
00370         {
00371                 // Use the current size of the file.
00372                 DWORD dwSizeHigh = 0;
00373                 DWORD dwSizeLow  = 0;
00374                 fileMapHandle = CreateFileMapping(fileHandle, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, dwSizeHigh, dwSizeLow, NULL);
00375                 if (fileMapHandle == NULL)
00376                         return 0;
00377         }
00378         return fileMapHandle;
00379 #else
00380         return 0;
00381 #endif
00382 }
00383 
00384 void DataSetTest::UnmapFile()
00385 {
00386 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00387         if (fileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00388         {
00389                 if (fileMapHandle != NULL)
00390                 {
00391                         CloseHandle(fileMapHandle);
00392                         fileMapHandle = NULL;
00393                 }
00394                 CloseHandle (fileHandle);
00395                 fileHandle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00396         }
00397 #endif
00398 }
